concept.description: Marks all public methods with label Public
concept.cypher: MATCH (m:Method:`C#`) WHERE m.accessibility='Public' SET m:Public RETURN count(m.name)

concept.description: Marks all protected methods with label Protected
concept.cypher: MATCH (m:Method:`C#`) WHERE m.accessibility='Protected' SET m:Protected RETURN count(m.name)

concept.description: Marks all private methods with label Private
concept.cypher: MATCH (m:Method:`C#`) WHERE m.accessibility='Private' SET m:Private RETURN count(m.name)

concept.description: Marks all public types with label Public
concept.cypher: MATCH (m:Type:`C#`) WHERE m.accessibility='Public' SET m:Public RETURN count(m.name)

concept.description: Marks all protected types with label Protected
concept.cypher: MATCH (m:Type:`C#`) WHERE m.accessibility='Protected' SET m:Protected RETURN count(m.name)

concept.description: Marks all private types with label Private
concept.cypher: MATCH (m:Type:`C#`) WHERE m.accessibility='Private' SET m:Private RETURN count(m.name)
